text-snippet.content:
You are solely responsible for the activity that occurs on your profile or account, and you must keep the password for your profile or account secure at all times.
You must notify the Company immediately should there be any unauthorized use or breach of security of your profile or account.
The Company will not be liable for your losses caused by any unauthorized use of your profile or account.
However, you shall be liable for any losses incurred by the Company or others due to such unauthorized use.
